channel.title: Code to open doors?
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a new server. Just don't want to have the hit-on-door way to train and make another. I know how to make another but not how to make doors open/close when clicking on it.
Any codes?

item.title: Code to open doors?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Make a case that replaces the closed/open door with an open/closed door. Just use the replaceObject method, it’s very simple. Or if you want you can do it that it deletes the door when you click on it and adds an open door, or the other way around using the addObject method.

Read full topic

item.title: Code to open doors?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Dont think you can in a server? :X… Ive never really seen this before, if you can make a tut on it, im sure u’ll get apreciated… But IMO i dont really think you can do it server wise :|… But hey thats 1 mans opinion, might be possible…

Read full topic
